mean_cn: n.侮辱，有伤尊严，无礼举动
mean_en: an act or occurrence that hurts someone\u0027s dignity or pride :an insulting or embarrassing act or occurrence
sentence: What an indignity! My girlfriend just tore my shirt in public!
sentence_trans: 女朋友在大庭广众下撕掉了我的衣服，太伤伦家的自尊了T_T
word_etyma: in不 ＋ dign值得，高贵 ＋ ity抽象名词 → 不高贵 → indignity轻视；侮辱
